- (AmazonCredentials *) credentials [read, write, retain]

- (NSString *) requestEndpoint [read, write, retain]

Request specific endpoint.

This value will override the setting in the service specific client used to submit the request. Inspect the 'endpoint' property in the AmazonXXXClient class to see the default endpoint.
